roleset.name: to misdirect, foolhardy

example.name: never take a warlord's advice
example.text: Analysts believe *0* some tribal warlords may have taken advantage of American firepower by *PRO* accusing [rival leaders]-1 of being Taliban and misguiding U.S. intelligence.

example.name: arg1
example.text: But for some reason it almost seems like the 35 year old man is some sort of predator whereas the 35 year old woman is only misguided .

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Given these factors, state policymaker's may be misguided in their assertion that districts financial woes are due to diseconomies of scale
example.arg: in their assertion that districts financial woes are due to diseconomies of scale
